title: Inception
text:
Director: Christopher Nolan
Genre: Science Fiction, Thriller
Starring: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page



Inception follows Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who specializes in the art of ‚Äúextraction‚Äù‚Äîstealing valuable secrets from within people‚Äôs subconscious during their dreams. Cobb is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased if he can successfully plant an idea into someone‚Äôs mind, a process known as ‚Äúinception.‚Äù





Mind-bending plot with multiple layers of reality

Stunning visual effects and dream-like sequences

Thought-provoking themes about reality and memory

A powerful emotional core about guilt and redemption






‚ÄúYou mustn‚Äôt be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.‚Äù ‚Äì Eames

title: Final Year Project: Movie Recommendation System
text: This project aims to develop a movie recommendation system that helps users discover new movies based on their preferences. It uses machine learning techniques to suggest films similar to the ones a user has liked in the past.

title: Final Year Project: Movie Recommendation System
text:
Collect and clean movie ratings data
Analyze user behavior and preferences
Build a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering
Design a simple web interface to display recommendations

title: Final Year Project: Movie Recommendation System
text:
Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn)
Jupyter Notebooks
Streamlit for the web app interface
TMDb API for movie details

title: Final Year Project: Movie Recommendation System
text:
The system recommends the following movies for a user who liked Inception:

Interstellar
The Matrix
Shutter Island

title: Final Year Project: Movie Recommendation System
text:
Add content-based filtering using genres and keywords

Improve UI/UX design for better user interaction

Include more user feedback for personalized recommendations

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
1. What is the GenAI tool you have used? Why did you choose it?
The GenAI tool I used is ChatGPT by OpenAI. I chose it because it is a powerful language model capable of understanding context, generating human-like responses, and assisting with a wide range of tasks‚Äîfrom writing and coding to idea generation and technical explanations. It is also user-friendly, fast, and widely recognized for its accuracy and flexibility.
2. How did the GenAI tool help you in completing the assessment?
ChatGPT helped me in multiple ways during the assessment:
‚Ä¢ Content Writing: I used it to draft structured content for my Quarto project pages. ‚Ä¢ Debugging YAML Errors: When I encountered a YAML indentation error, ChatGPT explained the problem clearly and showed me the correct indentation format, which saved time and prevented further issues. ‚Ä¢ Clarifying Concepts: When I was unsure about how to structure the _quarto.yml navigation or embed links properly, ChatGPT provided simple explanations and code examples.
3. What do you think are beneficial about the tool?
Some key benefits of ChatGPT are:
‚Ä¢ Speed and Efficiency: It can generate clear, well-structured content instantly.
‚Ä¢ 24/7 Availability: It‚Äôs always available, even late at night or during tight deadlines.
‚Ä¢ Learning Aid: It explains complex concepts in a simple and digestible way, which is especially useful for students.
4. What do you think are challenging about the tool?
While useful, there are some challenges:
Dependence Risk: Relying too heavily on it can reduce personal problem-solving or critical thinking skills.
5. How do you think GenAI tools will assist you for your future study or work? GenAI tools like ChatGPT will likely become everyday assistants in both study and work. They can:
‚Ä¢ Help with Coding & Debugging: Offer fast solutions or explanations when programming.
‚Ä¢ Automate Routine Tasks: Draft emails, generate reports, or summarize documents.
In the future, I see myself using GenAI to increase productivity, improve learning, and save time on repetitive tasks‚Äîboth as a student and in a professional setting.
